Pre-Game Insights: Andrew McCutchen and the Pittsburgh Pirates take the field on Sunday at Great American Ball Park against Hunter Greene, who is starting for the Cincinnati Reds.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates have the 21st-ranked team ERA among all MLB pitching staffs (4.20).
The Reds have an 8.7 K/9 this season as a pitching staff, which ranks 11th in the majors.
First pitch will be at 1:10 p.m. ET.
